short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your WhatsApp Web with a password and auto re-lock timer. Keep chats private with WhatsLock Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure your WhatsApp Web sessions with ease using the WhatsApp Web Locker extension. With this extension, you can lock your WhatsApp Web account with a password and set a session timer. Here's how it works:

Easy Setup: After adding the extension to your browser, set your preferred password and session timer.
Seamless Security: Once you've configured the extension, navigate to WhatsApp Web. You will be prompted to enter your password before you can access your messages.
Timed Lock: Your WhatsApp session will automatically lock again once the set timer expires, ensuring ongoing security.
Protect your privacy with WhatsApp Web Locker and enjoy secure, time-limited access to your conversations!
